hmmm.. with mine.. on boot up ... Network Manager appears in the notification area and looks for wireless netowrks ... I had set one up previously and included the ESSID and password, etc... network manager does this automatically ... Do you have nm-applet under Sessions/StartUp Programs?

in Manual Configuration (which is Networking under the System menu) set all of your interfaces to roaming
